App made by Carly Emile and Charles Zhu
To make a reservation navigate to the Make Reservation screen and fill out the information requested by the text field
"To view a reservation, navigate to the View Reservation screen. Tap on a reservation in the list to view details of that reservation

To delete a reservation, navigate to the Edit Reservation screen and tap on the reservation in the list that you\'d like to delete. Then, simply press the \'Delete\' button to remove. This action cannot be un-done.
"To edit a reservation, navigate to the Edit Reservation screen and tap on the reservation in the list that you'd like to change. Enter the new information and press the update button.
To change name or phone number, go to settings after the log in screen. Make changes and press the button to update.
